relatedBlades.title: Cisco Umbrella vs. Cloudflare One
relatedBlades.subtitle: Replace Umbrella with Cloudflare One for DNS filtering and accelerate your journey to Zero Trust SSE
relatedBlades.copy:
Stop relying on costly, complex, and fragmented Cisco security and switch to Cloudflare for DNS filtering.

Simplify operations day-to-day and your architecture long-term by unifying security across web, SaaS, and private apps on one platform and global network.

features.title: Simple management
features.description:
Multiple deployment modes with and without a device client to get started with DNS filtering across office and remote users.

Extend security with one unified control plane and one policy manager across composable SSE services built from the ground up.

features.title: Global speed & reliability
features.description:
Cloudflare's DNS filtering is built on one of the world's [fastest and most reliable](https://www.dnsperf.com/#!dns-resolvers) DNS resolvers (1.1.1.1.) for a seamless UX. 

With %{DataCenterCount}+ network locations in %{CountryCount}+ countries, protections are enforced close to end users wherever they are.

features.title: AI-backed threat intel
features.description:
Visibility across ~%{DNSQueriesPerDay} trillion DNS queries resolved per day powers our own AI/ML-backed threat hunting models. In particular, we excel in identifying [risky new and newly seen domains](https://blog.cloudflare.com/threat-detection-machine-learning-models/).  

For deeper customizability, [bring your own external threat feeds](https://developers.cloudflare.com/security-center/indicator-feeds/).

relatedBlades.title: Best-of-breed for DNS filtering
relatedBlades.copy:
Layer protections for office and remote users with controls you are familiar with from Cisco Umbrella. Achieve quick time-to-value, whether you prefer to 'set and forget' or to customize.

- Block domains and IPs by security, content, and application categories 
- Encrypt all DNS requests over HTTPS (DoH) or over TLS (DoT) 
- Route DNS queries to custom resolvers for granular controls
- Via our API, automate with Terraform or manage parent-child accounts

columnContent.title: Block Internet threats
columnContent.description: Prevent remote and office users from browsing to destinations with malware, ransomware, phishing, C2 & botnet, DNS tunneling, and other threats.

columnContent.title: Support compliance
columnContent.description: Meet legal requirements and standards for rigorous security from authorities like NIST and CISA in the US and the European Commission and ISO abroad.

columnContent.title: Enforce acceptable use policy
columnContent.description: Block unwanted content to enforce your AUP and filter browsing on guest WiFi networks across retail, hospitality, and other physical locations.

relatedBlades.title: Accelerate security modernization
relatedBlades.copy:
With Cisco, progressing towards a security service edge (SSE) approach requires expanding from Umbrella to Cisco Secure Access, a separate platform running on a separate architecture.

Streamline your journey with Cloudflare's unified approach:

- One policy manager across all SSE use cases
- One network and control plane for global consistency.
- All services are 100% cloud-native and built from the ground up on our network — not acquired and stitched together.
- All services available across all %{DataCenterCount}+ network locations
relatedBlades.sectionTitle: HOW IT WORKS: Zero Trust / SSE

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Compare capabilities

Based on publicly available information as of December 3, 2024

planFeatures.name: Billions of recursive DNS queries per day to inform threat intelligence
Block domain requests and IP responses by security risks and content categories
SWG with integrated CASB, DLP, & RBI
Full suite of SSE services (including ZTNA)
Unified management interface and platform for DNS filtering and SSE

features.name: Billions of recursive DNS queries per day to inform threat intelligence
Block domain requests and IP responses by security risks and content categories

planValues.textValue: All the time in all plans

features.name: Custom block pages and bypass options
User attribution and policy creation by identity provider for DNS filtering only

planValues.textValue: All of the below supported across all Cloudflare One plans: Corporate SSOs (Microsoft Active Directory and Azure AD, Google Workspace, Okta, PingIdentity; and more);  Social identities (Github, LinkedIn, and more);  Open Source (OIDC, SAML 2.0)
Microsoft Active Directory and Azure AD, Okta, or manual import with Cisco Umbrella DNS plans.  Additional IDPs supported with Cisco Umbrella SIG plans.

features.name: Virtual appliance  (for local on-prem DNS servers)
All services running in network locations
Traffic acceleration via a private backbone
SWG with integrated CASB, DLP, & RBI
Full suite of SSE services (including ZTNA)
Unified management interface and platform for DNS filtering and SSE
